Package clearcut

Class Clearcut

  • java.lang.Object
    • clearcut.Clearcut

  • public class Clearcut
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides access to the "Clearcut" C library that computes the NJ tree. NJ alg. can be standard or relaxed. Jukes-Cantor or Kimura correction can be used (if we provide the sequences, not only the distance matrix). The "Clearcut" library can be used only mutually exclusive which is handled by this class (there is a lock).

      • computeNJTree

        public static NJVertex computeNJTree(java.lang.String fastaFile,
                                     Configuration config)
        Computes an NJ tree using the "Clearcut" library.
        Parameters:
        fastaFile - file that represents either dna sequences or a distance matrix in fasta format
        config - the configuration
        Returns:
        the root of the NJ tree

      • computeNJMatrix

        public static float[][] computeNJMatrix(java.lang.String fastaFile,
                                        Configuration config,
                                        short matrixOutputSize)
        Computes the NJ matrix using the "Clearcut" library.
        Parameters:
        fastaFile - file that represents either dna sequences or a distance matrix in fasta format (see Test.main(String[]))
        config - configuration
        matrixOutputSize - size of the output matrix (number of leafs of the NJ tree ~ original sequences)
        Returns:
        distance matrix that corresponds to the distances in the NJ tree
